trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemCreated"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemDataBound"></xref> events of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemCreated> event is raised when an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control is created.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemDataBound> event is raised when an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control is bound to a data source.
For a list of initial property values for an instance of DataGridItemEventArgs, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemEventArgs"></xref> class.
Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemEventArgs> class.
When an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemEventArgs> is created by a call to this constructor, the following property is initialized to the specified value.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> that represents an item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref>.
Gets the referenced item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control when the event is raised.
Use this property to programmatically access the item referenced in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control when the event is raised.
The referenced item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control when the event is raised.
